net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.composite

Interface ClickToEditForm.Field

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClickToEditForm.AbstractField
    Enclosing class:
    ClickToEditForm

    public static interface ClickToEditForm.Field
    A field in the form. You may want to consider extending ClickToEditForm.AbstractField to implement this interface.
    Author:
    Ken Logan(ken@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods

    • Method Detail

      • commit

        boolean commit(Component editor,
             List<Message> messages)
        Commit the changes made in the editor. This method will not be called until after:
        • successful validation by all the Validators in the component tree rooted at the editor component
        • Successfully passing validation defined by the @{link validate(Component, List) method
        . The method may also perform validation.
        Parameters:
        editor - The editor that is being used and was provided from createEditorComponent(LocaleContext)
        messages - List to add validation messages to. Messages about validation issues should be added here if and only if an issue preventing successful commit occurred - in which case false should be returned.
        Returns:
        true if operation was successful. Otherwise, false should be returned and a validation message should be added to messages.

      • createEditorComponent

        Component createEditorComponent(LocaleContext context)
        Create the editor component. Implementations are not permitted to return the same component instance for multiple calls since the editor component will be closed at the ClickToEditForm's discretion.
        Parameters:
        context - the locale context
        Returns:
        The editor component (cannot be null)

      • createSummaryComponent

        Component createSummaryComponent(LocaleContext context)
        Create the summary component which should be a read-only view of the data for this field. The summary component is allowed to be closed at any time based upon the discretion of ClickToEditForm so a new summary component instance should be returned.
        Parameters:
        context - the locale context
        Returns:
        the summary component (cannot be null)

      • getDisplayClass

        String getDisplayClass()
        Get the display class to use for this field. This should be such that a CSS rule can easily target this field of the form.
        Returns:
        the display class which can be null but should be provided in order to generate good markup

      • getFieldName

        TextSource getFieldName()
        Get the field label
        Returns:
        the text representing the name for this form field. This should not be null.

      • isCommittable

        boolean isCommittable()
        Check if the editor for this form field is committable. Some editor UI's may commit changes as soon as the user requests them, in which case the commit method won't be called and instead of showing save/cancel buttons to the user, a "close" button will be shown instead.
        Returns:
        true if the editor supports commit(Component, List) and therefore the container should show save/cancel buttons for the editor.

      • isMultiEditor

        boolean isMultiEditor()
        Check if this field shows multiple parts in the editor.
        Returns:
        true if the field includes multiple parts in the editor

      • isMultiSummary

        boolean isMultiSummary()
        Check if this field shows multiple parts in the summary.
        Returns:
        true if the field includes multiple parts in the summary

      • validate

        void validate(Component editor,
            List<Message> messages)
        Validate the changes made in the editor. Validators will also be ran in conjunction with this method so that implementors of this interface have flexibility in how validation is performed.
        Parameters:
        editor - The editor that is being used and was provided from createEditorComponent(LocaleContext)
        messages - List to add validation messages to.
